nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 31

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 31 is the thirty-first issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 magazine published by De Agostini in 2017. It contained the inner and outer casings of the right foot of the buildable R2-D2.
